data.title: • Andreas Limpak on LinkedIn: Dortmund's players, fans stunned after falling short in German title race
data.meta_description: As many of you know, I am a diehard #BorussiaDortmund supporter. While the season ended on a challenging note for us, an article by #AP brought to light some…
data.text:
Mondays are often seen as a challenge, but let's turn that around. 🚀 - Today, let's approach the week with curiosity and a fresh perspective. Here’s an unusual Monday Activity for You 💪 : ➡ Gratitude Minute: Take 60 seconds to list three things you're grateful for. It could be anything from a supportive colleague to that perfect cup of coffee. ➡ Random Act of Kindness: Do something kind for a colleague, friend, or even a stranger. It could be a compliment, a helping hand, or just a smile. ➡ Inspiration Share: Post about something that inspired you over the weekend. For me, it was the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games in Paris. Despite the rain trying to steal the show, the Olympic spirit shone through. The rain sent a warning Friday morning and threatened through much of Friday afternoon. But Paris’ grey skies finally opened up about 30 minutes into a three-and-a-half-hour show, leading to perhaps the most drenched opening ceremony in the history of the modern Olympics. Hundreds of thousands of spectators lined the banks of the River Seine, clad in ponchos and rain jackets, and a canopy of umbrellas sprouted up at the first hint of raindrops. After an hour of steady rain, some of the crowd had enough, but the spirit remained undampened. The French athletes, sailing in boats on the Seine, waved flags enthusiastically. Despite occasional slips and drenched instruments, the performers and athletes showcased resilience and joy, embodying the true Olympic spirit. Let’s make today not just another Monday but a launchpad for innovation and connection! 🌟🚀 Share your thoughts and experiences in the comments. Let’s inspire and be inspired! #motivation #positivity

Boom! 🚀 Welcome aboard, Sai Yang! 🚀 Everyone at Databricks is thrilled to have you join us, given your impressive background in the #automotive and #manufacturing sectors. Your expertise is an asset to our team and a vital component in empowering our customers to revolutionise the world through data. But all professional attributes aside, having you as a great person is precious for thriving in our culture! Even though you are just one week with us, you are already moving the needle. Let's have an impact together! 🤘 Sepideh Jahangiri, Max, Andreas Terörde Nikola D. Dr. Philip Laserstein Marco Metting Matthias Ingerfeld Frank Boening Roman Dölle geb. Pritzkow Shiv Trisal, Matthias Herrmann #newhire #teamgrowth #welcomeaboard #industryexperts #leadership #teamwork #innovation #datadriven #workplaceculture #employeeengagement #techindustry #professionaldevelopment #excitingtimes #corporatelife #funatwork

What a great one 🙌 ... I've thought it's worth sharing - below are two nuggets which give you a glimpse of the content: John F. Kennedy once observed that the word “crisis,” when written in Chinese, is composed of two characters—one represents danger, the other opportunity. He wasn’t altogether correct on the linguistics, but the sentiment holds: times of crisis, disruption, and volatility require courage from leaders to make bold strategic choices. It’s also a chance to leave less-creative rivals in the rearview mirror. The best leaders and companies are ambidextrous: prudent about managing the downside while aggressively pursuing the upside. Thanks, McKinsey & Company #leadership #growthmindset #databricks #BusinessStrategy #changemanagement #Resilience

All right – you might be familiar with #Tuckman and #KublerRoss. You know that navigating team-building or guiding individuals through a change curve is no small feat. But what happens when you're faced with the perfect storm of both? There are two possible outcomes: it will either be a resounding success or a spectacular failure. By recognising and steering the process effectively, you can set yourself up for mutual victory. My journey in team building and management has revealed the intricate dance between forming new groups and navigating personal change. The challenges are immense, and the potential negative outcomes of not addressing them are significant. However, with the right strategies, these challenges can be transformed into opportunities for brilliance and exceptional performance. The potential for success is high, and the rewards are even higher. I don't really have a secret sauce, as every situation is different. So, it would be cool to get your thoughts! Join the discussion... 💪 #teambuilding #team #development #change #management #coaching #databricks #leadership

Boom! Celebrating Two Incredible Years at Databricks! – What a Ride…. 😎 Over the past two years, I've had the privilege of working with some of the industry's brightest minds, contributing to groundbreaking projects, and growing professionally and personally. I've asked for it - I got it! 💪 Here are some highlights from this incredible journey: ⭐ Dream Team: Working with my talented and slightly quirky colleagues has been the highlight of my job. Whether we're brainstorming or just trying to find the coffee machine, the camaraderie and support are unmatched. 🌟 Skyrocketing Growth: Databricks isn't just a workplace but a never-ending boot camp for your brain. The opportunities to learn and grow here are as plentiful as the snacks in the break room (and trust me, that's a lot). 🌟 Epic Projects: From wrangling data dragons to building solutions that would make even Tony Stark jealous, every project has been an adventure and a crash course in awesomeness. 🌟 Memorable Moments: We've worked, laughed, climbed mountains, celebrated, welcomed new team members, and watched colleagues jet off to new adventures around the globe. I want to extend a heartfelt thank you to my amazing team, mentors, and everyone at Databricks who has been part of this journey. Your trust, support, and encouragement have not only been invaluable but have also shaped my professional growth and success. I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you! 🙏 I finally found myself again. Looking forward to many more years of innovation, growth, success and fun! Julia Limpak Pawarit Laosunthara Jiri Harazim 🇺🇦 Sepideh Jahangiri Rosina Kazakova Andreas Terörde Nikola D. Max Köhler Linda Weimann Tobi Oluwole Lukas Grubwieser Irfan Maroof Mohammad Sahil Dr. Philip Laserstein Simon Tschöke Marco Metting Nicolas Maillard Matthias Ingerfeld Toby Balfre Anton Groß Volker Tjaden Jan Peterson #Anniversary #Databricks #CareerMilestone #ProfessionalGrowth #Teamwork #Innovation NetApp

Watch out - there's really good reading ahead! 🤘 - (Although you need some time, invest it!) I just finished reading McKinsey & Company's gem on generative AI, and I'm genuinely impressed by its depth and actionable insights. Three things that really stood out to me: 1️⃣ There is a clear distinction between Takers, Shapers, and Makers. Understanding where your organisation fits can shape your AI strategy. 2️⃣ The emphasis on transforming technology functions and upgrading architecture. Essential for staying ahead in the AI race. 3️⃣ The focus on upskilling the workforce for future-ready capabilities. Preparing our teams for tomorrow is crucial. Advertising part: This aligns perfectly with Databricks' GenAI Strategy, showcasing real-world applications and successes. The future is here, and it's exciting! https://lnkd.in/eNVftXJ5 #generativeai #cio #cto #databricks #innovation #technology

Time flies - so don't miss this 45-minute webinar on June 5th, the day to change your life and the world with data! 🚀 Meet Our Experts: Sepideh Jahangiri, Solutions Architect Lisa Sielaff, Sr. Solution Engineer Felix Mutzl, Data & AI Strategist Alan M., Solutions Architect Mahmoud Hafez, Delivery Solutions Architect Alex Ott, Lead Specialist Solution Architect Andreas Limpak, Sr. Manager Solutions Architects (That’s me!) Plus insights from SVP & General Manager EMEA, Samuel Bonamigo, and VP of Field Engineering EMEA, Toby Balfre. Discover: Vibrant job roles and responsibilities Our commitment to continuous education and tech innovation Balancing a thriving career with personal life Engage with Us: Join the live Q&A session to get real-time answers from our experts. Whether you're starting out or looking to advance, this webinar is your gateway to understanding life at Databricks. See you there - at Databricks! #Databricks #CareerDevelopment #Webinar #TechnologyCareers #Innovation #DiversityInTech
